entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 near the Richardson mountains this morning. Wind becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the morning then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023
